hotels.description: Escape to the English countryside with a stay in a historic cottage house in Haslemere at voco Lythe Hill Hotel & Spa, an IHG Hotel. Set on 22 acres of picturesque pastors, this hotel is the perfect grassy getaway, with an onsite spa offering pampering wellness experiences, two delectable restaurants and a glistening indoor pool. When you aren't basking in the sunshine, stretch your muscles at the fitness centre or succumb to complete relaxation in the yoga studio.
